key.summary: Most recent x position of minder window
key.description: Most recent x position of minder window

key.description: Most recent y position of minder window

key.summary: Most recent width of minder window
key.description: Most recent width of minder window

key.summary: Most recent height of minder window
key.description: Most recent height of minder window

key.name: current-properties-shown
key.summary: Most recent state of the current item properties sidebar
key.description: Most recent state of the current item properties sidebar

key.summary: Most recent state of the map properties sidebar
key.description: Most recent state of the map properties sidebar

key.description: Most recent state of the style properities sidebar

key.summary: Most recent state of the sticker properties sidebar
key.description: Most recent state of the sticker properties sidebar

key.summary: Width of the property sidebar when visible
key.description: Width of the property sidebar when visible

key.name: enable-ui-animations
key.summary: Enables/disables application UI animations
key.description: Enables/disables application UI animations

key.name: enable-animations
key.summary: Enables/Disables canvas animations
key.description: Controls the initial state of the canvas animator

key.name: hide-connections
key.summary: Hides/Shows all connections in the canvas
key.description: Controls the initial state of the canvas hide connections widget

key.name: hide-callouts
key.summary: Hides/Shows all callouts in the canvas
key.description: Controls the initial state of the canvas hide callouts widget

key.name: search-opt-nodes
key.summary: Search option for nodes
key.description: Specifies whether nodes should be searched or not

key.summary: Search option for connections
key.description: Specifies whether connections should be searched or not

key.summary: Search option for callouts
key.description: Specifies whether callouts should be searched or not

key.summary: Search option for node/connection titles
key.description: Specifies whether node/connection titles should be searched or not

key.summary: Search option for node/connection notes
key.description: Specifies whether node/connection notes should be searched or not

key.name: search-opt-folded
key.summary: Search option for folded nodes
key.description: Specifies whether folded nodes should be searched or not

key.summary: Search option for unfolded nodes
key.description: Specifies whether unfolded nodes should be searched or not

key.name: search-opt-tasks
key.summary: Search option for task nodes
key.description: Specifies whether task nodes should be searched or not

key.name: search-opt-nontasks
key.summary: Search option for non-task nodes
key.description: Specifies whether non-task nodes should be searched or not

key.name: search-opt-all-tabs
key.summary: Search option which searches all tabs when true
key.description: Specifies whether all tabs will be searched (true) or only the current tab (false)

key.name: image-id
key.summary: Unique ID added to image names
key.description: Specifies the current unique image ID value

key.summary: Specifies the expanded state of the Callout Options panel in the Style properties
key.description: Specifies the expanded state of the Callout Options panel in the Style properties

key.summary: Last used callout font family in Style properties
key.description: Last used callout font family in Style properties

key.name: style-callout-font-size
key.summary: Last used callout font size in Style properties
key.description: Last used callout font size in Style properties

key.name: style-callout-padding
key.summary: Last used callout padding value in Style properties
key.description: Last used callout padding value in Style properties

key.name: style-callout-pointer-width
key.summary: Last used callout pointer width value in Style properties
key.description: Last used callout pointer width value in Style properties

key.name: style-callout-pointer-length
key.summary: Last used callout pointer length value in Style properties
key.description: Last used callout pointer length value in Style properties

key.name: style-branch-options-expanded
key.summary: Specifies the expanded state of the Branch Options panel in the Style properties
key.description: Specifies the expanded state of the Branch Options panel in the Style properties

key.name: style-link-options-expanded
key.summary: Specifies the expanded state of the Link Options panel in the Style properties
key.description: Specifies the expanded state of the Link Options panel in the Style properties

key.name: style-node-options-expanded
key.summary: Specifies the expanded state of the Node Options panel in the Style properties
key.description: Specifies the expanded state of the Node Options panel in the Style properties

key.name: style-connection-options-expanded
key.summary: Specifies the expanded state of the Connection Options panel in the Style properties
key.description: Specifies the expanded state of the Connection Options panel in the Style properties

key.name: new-node-from-edit
key.summary: Specifies if we should create a new node directly from edit mode if Return or Tab is pressed
key.description: Specifies if we should create a new node directly from edit mode if Return or Tab is pressed

key.name: focus-mode-alpha
key.summary: Alpha value to use for all nodes/connections that are not within focus in focus mode
key.description: Alpha value to use for all nodes/connections that are not within focus in focus mode. Value must be between 0 and 1.

key.name: quick-entry-spaces-per-tab
key.summary: Specifies the number of space characters that match the indentation of the tab character in quick entry mode and text import.
key.description: Specifies the number of space characters that match the indentation of the tab character in quick entry mode and text import.

key.name: auto-parse-embedded-urls
key.summary: Specifies if embedded URLs found in node titles should be automatically highlighted.
key.description: Specifies if embedded URLs found in node titles should be automatically highlighted.

key.name: enable-markdown
key.summary: Specifies if node/connection title text will be treated as Markdown syntax.
key.description: Specifies if node/connection title text will be treated as Markdown syntax.

key.name: enable-unicode-input
key.summary: Specifies if unicode input handling is enabled
key.description: Specifies if unicode input (starting with a backslash character) will be enabled

key.name: rotate-main-link-colors
key.summary: If set, rotates link colors in the main branches when adding. If set to false, the same color will be used as the last color.
key.description: If set, rotates link colors in the main branches when adding. If set to false, the same color will be used as the last color.

key.name: text-field-use-custom-font-size
key.summary: If set, uses the text-field-custom-font-size setting to determine text field font size; otherwise, the system default is used.
key.description: If set, uses the text-field-custom-font-size setting to determine text field font size; otherwise, the system default is used.

key.name: text-field-custom-font-size
key.summary: Specifies the font size to use in text editing fields (i.e, quick entry or notes field) if text-field-use-custom-font-size is set.
key.description: Specifies the font size to use in text editing fields (i.e, quick entry or notes field) if text-field-use-custom-font-size is set.

key.name: edit-connection-title-on-creation
key.summary: If true, the connection title will be added and put into edit mode immediately after the connection is made.
key.description: If true, the connection title will be added and put into edit mode immediately after the connection is made.

key.name: default-theme
key.summary: Specifies the name of the default theme to use when creating new mind maps.
key.description: Specifies the name of the default theme to use when creating new mind maps.

key.name: select-on-hover
key.summary: If enabled, selects items when mouse cursor hovers over the item.
key.description: If enabled, selects items when mouse cursor hovers over the item.

key.name: select-on-hover-timeout
key.summary: If select-on-hover set, specifies hover time (in milliseconds).
key.description: If select-on-hover set, specifies hover time (in milliseconds).

key.name: last-directory
key.summary: Last used directory in open/save file dialog
key.description: Stores last used directory in the open/save dialog and uses it when open/save is later invoked

key.name: last-export
key.summary: Last used export
key.description: Stores last used export and uses it when it is later invoked

key.name: hide-themes-not-matching-visual-style
key.summary: Hide themes that do not match the current system visual style
key.description: Hide themes that do not match the current system visual style (aka. light/dark mode)

key.name: print-settings
key.summary: Printer settings used in the last print invocation
key.description: Printer settings used in the last print invocation

key.name: page-setup
key.summary: Printer page setup used in the last print invocation
key.description: Printer page setup used in the last print invocation

key.name: max-auto-completion-items
key.summary: Specifies the maximum number of items that will be displayed in the auto-completion dropdown.
key.description: Specifies the maximum number of items that will be displayed in the auto-completion dropdown.

key.name: natural-scrolling-type
key.summary: Specifies whether natural scrolling should be used when panning the canvas.
key.description: Specifies whether natural scrolling should be used when panning the canvas. Valid values are: system, enabled, disabled
